name: The Floor Is Water (Rovi Decena)
description:
Channel your anger and duke it out with the marine life in The Floor Is Water, a fast-paced brawler where you use your Trusty Pool Noodle™ to deal out the goods to anyone who gets too close!

--

Developed by:

  • Ash
  • Frédéric Jubinville
  • Ian Park
  • and Rovi Decena (me!)

for PegJam 2023.
